item.title: [ 35] I don't get it. Trump only said he's going to pause the tariffs for 90 days.
item.description:
I don't get it.
Trump only said he's going to pause the tariffs for 90 days.
Why is it such a bounce back? It makes sense that it'd recover, but people are acting like this is the end of tariffs.
This is only temporary and we're going back to tariffs after 90s days if the entire world doesn't bend the knee?

item.title: [ 65] Amateur dev anon here, how does /v/ feel about turn based systems that require
item.description:
Amateur dev anon here, how does /v/ feel about turn based systems that require some form of action skills to excel at? Something like Paper Mario except instead of timing a button press maybe it requires something with more skill like entering a complex fighting game combo or like the shmup sections in undertale but difficult. Would that be appealing? Or am I just alienating both the turn based players and the action players by creating a game with both?

Original filename: Thousand-Year-Door[1].jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [199] The U.S. is fucked long-term.
item.description:
>125% tariff on China, 3rd largest trading partner
>25% tariff on Canada and Mexico, #1 and #2 respectively, for all non-USMCA goods -- basically 50% of everything we import from them
>10% universal duty
>Greer publicly floundered during a hearing with congress today where he literally learned of the reversal mid-session, implying he was totally uninformed
>Bessent directly contradicts Trump saying this was the plan all along after Trump says he only reversed the decision because markets were looking "queasy"

So a few things:

Despite what the shitposting MAGA tards on this board are claiming, anyone with half a brain can recognize that this policy, even reduced, is still incredibly destructive and is going to cause chaos. If no exemptions are made on the Chinese front -- which I'm pretty sure there won't be, even though he's signaled exemptions for certain businesses from the 10% duty, because that would kind of defeat the purpose -- then whole supply chains which rely on Chinese imports will collapse overnight & it'll force retailers to massively reorganize in a short amount of time, risking steep losses & mass layoffs, or forcing them to raise prices, risking inflation.

Original filename: 1724956158273881.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 39] TikTok Doc decries ADHD meds; HN on life support
item.description:
https://nypost.com/2025/04/09/health/cardiologist-warns-commonly-prescribed-drug-is-toxic-for-heart/
>and the other is the amphetamine class like Adderall and Vyvanse.”
>Both types, he said, “increase the levels of norepinephrine in the blood, which can lead to slightly higher blood pressure and a mild increase in risk of arrhythmias.”
>That might sound minor, but new research and common-sense questions have Levine sounding the alarm.
>“We know that very elevated levels of norepinephrine for years, like in people with adrenal tumors and heart failure, can adversely affect the heart — levels are much higher here,” Levine said.
>“What if a child takes this for 20 years? The FDA never commented on this. Or an elderly patient takes this — or anyone at risk, people with congenital heart conditions like a bicuspid aortic valve, which 1.5% of the population has and are at risk for aortic aneurysms? The FDA never did their job.”
>And now? The longer-term data is starting to back him up.
>“In April 2024, they find that when you follow them up for eight years, young healthy people aged 20 to 40, they have a 57% higher risk than young healthy people not on these meds,” Levine said.

Original filename: Screenshot 2025-04-09 at 17-30-34 Cardiologist warns commonly prescribed drug is toxic for heart.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 47] Trump announces 90-day pause on ‘reciprocal’ tariffs with exception of China
item.description:
https://www.cnn.com/2025/04/09/business/reciprocal-tariff-pause-trump/index.html
President Donald Trump announced a complete pause on all the “reciprocal” tariffs that went into effect at midnight, with the exception of China.

Tariffs on China will be increased to 125% from 104%, he said.

Trump in a Truth Social post Wednesday said he has “authorized a 90 day PAUSE, and a substantially lowered Reciprocal Tariff during this period, of 10%, also effective immediately.”

“Based on the lack of respect that China has shown to the World’s Markets, I am hereby raising the Tariff charged to China by the United States of America to 125%, effective immediately,” Trump said in his social media post. “At some point, hopefully in the near future, China will realize that the days of ripping off the U.S.A., and other Countries, is no longer sustainable or acceptable,” he wrote.

Stocks rocketed higher on the news, with the Dow surging 2,200 points, or 5.9%. The S&P 500 rose 6.5% and the Nasdaq was more than 8% higher.

Trump, however, did not indicate he was pausing the 10% universal tariff on all trading partners, with the exception of Canada and Mexico, that went into effect over the weekend. Therefore, countries that were subjects of reciprocal tariffs will continue to have a 10% tariff levied on them.

Original filename: 1743562230347138.jpg

item.title: [ 92] White House Confirms Trump Is Exploring Ways To ‘Deport’ U.S. Citizens
item.description:
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/white-house-confirms-trump-is-exploring-ways-to-deport-us-citizens_n_67f580abe4b0a5ea5c7608d2

White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said Tuesday that President Donald Trump is exploring legal pathways to “deport” U.S. citizens to El Salvador, where the administration has already arranged to house deported immigrants in a prison known for its human rights abuses. (Watch the video, above.)

Leavitt suggested the effort would be limited to people who have committed major crimes, but Trump has also mentioned the possibility of sending people who commit lesser offenses abroad.

Any such move on the part of the Trump administration is certain to be challenged in court. It is also not clear what legal authority could be used to justify expelling U.S. citizens from their homeland.

“These would be heinous, violent criminals who have broken our nation’s laws repeatedly. These are violent, repeat offenders on American streets,” Leavitt told reporters at a press briefing.

“The president has said if it’s legal, right, if there is a legal pathway to do that. He’s not sure, [and] we are not sure if there is,” Leavitt continued. “It’s an idea that he has simply floated and has discussed very publicly in the effort of transparency.”

Original filename: 1740778791723484.png

item.title: [ 39] Texan scientists un-extinct the dire wolf species
item.description:
While California is bickering about fringe minority issues, the Great Men in Texas just un-extincted an entire species. Un-extincted is expected to be added to dictionaries everywhere after this pivotal achievement
They used the DNA found in a species known as Dire Wolf that went extinct 10,000 years ago, and made 20 precise edits to it using DNA from its closing living relative, and then grew them in a surrogate mother.
They were born October 1 2024 and are currently alive and healthy.
https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/meet-dire-wolf-trio-remus-romulus-khaleesi-how-texas-lab-revived-extinct-species-1732511
Meet The Dire Wolf Trio Remus, Romulus And Khaleesi: How A Texas Lab Revived An Extinct Species

It was once thought to be a creature of fantasy, made famous by Game of Thrones, but now the legendary dire wolf has returned—sort of. Scientists at Texas-based biotech company Colossal Biosciences claim to have successfully revived the extinct predator through cutting-edge gene editing, producing three live wolf pups that carry dire wolf DNA for the first time in over 12,000 years.

The landmark achievement marks the world's first successful instance of de-extinction, according to The New York Times. Although the animals are not exact replicas of the ancient species, they carry 20 key dire wolf genes, including those influencing size, coat colour, and build.

Two males named Romulus and Remus were born in October 2024, and three months later, a female named Khaleesi. All three now live in a secure, 2,000-acre preserve somewhere in the northern United States. The wolves are already showing telltale traits: white, dense fur, large bodies, bushy tails and thick manes. According to Colossal's chief scientific officer, Beth Shapiro, the animals represent the closest humans have come to bringing an extinct species back to life.

Original filename: 🐺 Romulus & Remus 🐺.png

item.title: [ 94] /rmug/ - Real Madrid Ultimate General
item.description:
So, it happened AGAIN. We can blame the House of Windsor, we can blame Queen Elizabeth for supporting Arsenal beyond the grave, we can blame the House of Bourbon, we can blame King Felipe for supporting Atleti, we can blame Princess Leonor for having a crush on Gavi, we can blame PM Sanchez, we can blame PSOE, we can blame PP, we can blame Vox, we can blame our media cavern for feeding us lie after lie, we can blame our ugly shitty gray corpse kit, we can blame Abuelotti’s full-blown Alzheimer’s, we can blame UEFA, we can blame La Liga, we can blame Tebas for not saving us this time, we can blame Uncle Floren for not making the call, we can blame Rice having the match of his life, we can blame Comepinga’s atrocious defending, we can blame Mrappe kwabbing, we can blame Mono disappearing in a big match as usual, we can blame La Masia for schooling Arteta in the Barça methodology of BTFO us, but the truth is it's simply not enough. Tactics, determination, skin color, you name it, it all stinks.

Don't get me wrong, I still have full faith in Abuelotti and the lads, but MASSIVE reinforcements are desperately needed RIGHT FUCKING NOW. Otherwise, now that we’ve been humiliated by fucking Arsenal, I'm not very optimistic about our chances in La Liga, Copa final, or this cursed Champions League KO round. Not playing like this. What do you think, /rmug/? Abuelotti #IN or #OUT?

>Some helpful links to numb the pain

https://www.marca.com
https://www.as.com
https://www.twitch.tv/elchiringuitotv?lang=es
https://jlingzofficial.com/

item.title: [289] /tcg/ Trading Card Game General
item.description:
Richter Edition

>I want to learn the game, where do I begin?
Download PTCGL at https://tcg.pokemon.com/en-us/tcgl
The game has a quick tutorial and a bunch of decent decks to get you started against other beginners or against the AI. Some of those decks are very close to meta too. You can also go to your local game store and see if people are playing Pokémon.

>I know how to play, how do I make my own deck?
You have a decent beginner's guide at https://www.justinbasil.com/guide
There's also the old /tcg/ guide at https://imgur.com/a/W4NkOu6
After that, look up meta decks and try to reverse engineer them to see how things work.

>Where to find meta decks?
For big irl events, go to https://limitlesstcg.com/decks
For online events, go to https://play.limitlesstcg.com/decks?game=PTCG
For japanese events, go to https://pokecabook.com/archives/1417

Previous thread: >>57616309

Old /tcg/ pastebin: https://pastebin.com/Ge95YuMA

Rotation Notice: https://www.pokemon.com/us/pokemon-news/2025-pokemon-tcg-standard-format-rotation-announcement

item.title: [162] Working on my Pokémon Fangame where almost everything is a submission, replaci
item.description:
Working on my Pokémon Fangame where almost everything is a submission, replacing vanilla types, mons, abilities, moves etc.

Took a bit to make a new thread, as I was catching up on implementing mons, abilities and moves

Main Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/Unnamed-Pkmn-Game-1b5b9ecf5b6e80d5889dda00b4bf40e7

Typechart: https://files.catbox.moe/7ii2eb.png

Pokemon Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1bab9ecf5b6e80bcbb9fd4c2994a4c4a?v=1bab9ecf5b6e802b8b92000c0d380208

Moves Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1b5b9ecf5b6e8035baaae94d16ef813c?v=1b5b9ecf5b6e80b3b9ae000c5e27a560

Abilities Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1b5b9ecf5b6e80cca0f9c5ce94ef9049?v=1b5b9ecf5b6e80998e35000cd4cddfd0

Currently open for submissions for:
- Type chart effectiveness changes
- Moves
- Abilities
- Items
- Sprites/Backsprites for mons/items without Sprites (See docs)
- Menu Sprites (128x64)
- Pokémon
- Name for the Project

Most of the submission options don't have a template since they're rather simple so don't need one, only Pokémon submissions:

>Name*:
>Type(s)*:
>Stats*:
>Move(s)*:
>Abilitiy/ies*:
>Growth Rate*:
>BaseXP:
>EVs:
>Catch Rate:
>Base Happiness:
>Height:
>Weight:
>Egg Group(s):
>Hatch Steps:
>Category+Pokedex*:
>Front Sprite*:
>Backsprite:
>Shiny:
>Wild held Item(s):
>Cry:
>Evolves To/Method:
>Evolves from:
*Required
Send links to sprites

Addionally open for discussions on:
- Project Name
- Important Earlygame Trainers

If you're interested in contributing but don't have any original ideas, you can also fill in requests, listed here:
https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1c9b9ecf5b6e8089894ae49d5ef6dc23?v=1c9b9ecf5b6e8077b452000cede46188

These were mentioned previously in the request tab, but looking for starter evos as they are round-robin:
https://files.catbox.moe/od67sa.png

item.title: [158] /out/ings with a pipe
item.description:
Old thread: >>2774508

This is a thread for enjoying a pipe while doing outdoor activities. If you ask why this belongs on /out/, you've never spent an evening by the campfire with a pipe silently enjoying the nature around you, and you're missing out.

>how to get started
Purchase a Missouri Meerschaum Legend and a pouch of Half and Half or Captain Black tobacco, available at most smoke shops. You will need a lighter or match, and something to tamp it with--a large nail works well if you don't have a pipe tool. Fill the pipe with tobacco, pack it down halfway, top it off, pack it down to 3/4, top it off again, pack gently and enjoy. Smoke slower than you think you need to, the tobacco tastes best when it is burning cool. Tamp and re-light as needed. If you still have trouble, try different methods on YouTube until you find one that works for you.

>smoking a pipe will give you cancer
While any tobacco consumption comes with some risk, the cancer risks from occasional pipe use are pretty minimal. Educate yourself and make your own informed health decisions. Some info here https://aacrjournals.org/cancerpreventionresearch/article/10/12/704/46541/Association-between-Cigar-or-Pipe-Smoking-and

>muh weed
Not the time or place. Start your own thread

>I DON’T LIKE WHAT YOU LIKE REEEEEE
Then leave the thread. Pipes have been a part of outdoors culture for centuries. If you don’t like it, leave.

Original filename: 0687fd190525af3678814c5f459c2d0a.jpg
item.author: Anonymous
